channel.title: DragonKK's 663+ auto updater client need JRE6 compiler
channel.description:
Does anyone know how I can compile Dragonkk's client with JRE6?
I keep getting a error that there is no such thing...
[code] @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar;lib/com.jar; -d bin src/*.java @pause [/code] [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: DragonKK's 663+ auto updater client need JRE6 compiler
item.dc:creator: @ElderscrollsRSPS ElderscrollsRSPS
item.description:
@ElderscrollsRSPS wrote:

Does anyone know how I can compile Dragonkk’s client with JRE6?

I keep getting a error that there is no such thing…

@echo off
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/clientlibs.jar;lib/com.jar; -d bin src/*.java
@pause
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M
ain
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
